attributes.title: My wife left me because of this
attributes.review: First of all she is not a trump fan. She wanted me to vote Biden. But I downloaded this app just to check it out. And it was horrible. My wife was going through my phone and saw the app. She immediately started yelling at me. I still thought I was fine. Then she opened the app and saw how bad it looks. She yelled not only do you support a horrible person but an app worth bad design. She then walked out the door. That was last week.

attributes.title: ruined my phone
attributes.review: When I tried to download the app it took over two hours to completely be installed. But then my phone started glitching and the next day it completely shut off. Took it to Apple support and they said the app was corrupted. They were able to get my phone on again, but it was full of pornographic images and none of the apps worked. Had to buy a completely new phone. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.

attributes.title: disgusted

Showing nude photos in hopes people will vote for him? That is unacceptable. My door knob is bigger than the Presidents penis. Take a hint, Bunker Boy, we donâ€™t want you anymore.
